Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First I need to parse the pseudo-BPMN structure. Let me start by breaking down each part step by step. The process starts with receiving a customer request. Then theres an XOR gateway to check if its standard or custom.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For standard requests the path is Task B1 Standard Validation followed by an AND gateway where Credit Check and Inventory Check run in parallel. After both complete they move to Calculate Delivery Date.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For custom requests its Task B2 Feasibility Analysis leading to another XOR if feasible prepare quotation if not send rejection and end.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then regardless of path theres a convergence point where they check if approval is needed. If yes obtain manager approval. If approved generate invoice. If not re-evaluate and loop back to either E1 or D. If no approval needed go straight to invoice. Finally send confirmation and end.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I need to explain each tasks purpose. The XOR gateways are for decisions based on request type or feasibility. The AND gateway is parallel processing. The join after parallel checks is a synchronization point.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Convergence happens after the parallel tasks and after the standard custom paths merge before the approval check. The loop occurs if approval is denied sending back to either the standards D or customs E1.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Differences between standard and custom standard has parallel validations custom has feasibility analysis. Rejections happen early for custom if not feasible. Approvals are triggered based on the next XOR after delivery date quotation. Rework loops when approval isnt granted.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I should structure the explanation in order of the process explaining each step gateways and how the paths interact. Make sure to highlight the purpose of each task and gateway how they converge or loop and the conditions for approval rework. Also clarify the standard vs custom differences clearly.
